pages.text: Ancient sagas and cave paintings describe a sharp-edged mushroom named $(o)Laccaria amethystina$() containing shiny splinters. Unfortunately, it has never been sighted and is therefore considered extinct.
This mushroom consists of multiple stems and caps with a purple color.
The adult caps of the Amethyst Deceiver contain valuable amethyst splinters, which can be extracted with care.

pages.title: Blindness
pages.text: Getting the spores of this inedible mushroom in your eyes will temporarily blur your vision.
